name: WorldEdit
description: I promise your builds are not any less impressive if you decide to use WorldEdit. I strongly recommend learning how to use WorldEdit if you’re super into building (ESPECIALLY if you’re into mega builds or terraforming) because it will save you so much time and can end up looking cleaner.$(br2)All content of my building guide will be uploaded to my OneNote. $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://1drv.ms/u/s!Atp2GkCazUCzb49PlX2XkJHiyAA)Here's the link
